titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the $25,000 offset for individuals under the passive loss rules to apply to investments in wind energy facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/5/2003--Introduced. Amend s the Internal Revenue Code to allow the $25,000 passive loss offset for individuals without any income-based phaseout for investments in wind energy facilities. Exempts such wind energy facility offset from the active participation requirement.
